title: Civil penalties
context: ยง6E-11.5 Civil penalties. Except as provided in section 6E-11, any person who violates this chapter, or any rule adopted pursuant to this chapter shall be fined not less than $500 nor more than $10,000 for each separate violation. Each day of each violation constitutes a separate violation. [L 2003, c 104, pt of ยง2; am L 2005, c 128, ยง4]
